messages.title: Straight talking.
messages.content: I am a freeborn Briton, who resents being governed by untouchable European bureaucrats. My birthplace was Rottingdean, I know the area well, especially as I have worked as a GP/anaesthetist locally for 35 years. Lately I am very concerned about the Saltdean Lido and also the disgraceful train conditions for commuters. With the £45 million per day independence bonus, I look to the land of milk and honey outside the EU where we can spend our money on British people.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Save and improve the Saltdean Lido
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Expresses concern about the Saltdean Lido and the intention to focus on this issue locally.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Improve conditions for Sussex rail commuters
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Wishes to address and improve the disgraceful train conditions for commuters in Sussex.

issues.brexitEurope: Resents being governed by untouchable European bureaucrats.
issues.economy: With the £45 million per day independence bonus, I look to the land of milk and honey outside the EU where we can spend our money on British people.

contactInformation.address: UK Independence Party, PO Box 408, Newton Abbot TQ12 9BG.
